author: Simon Difford
description: Created in April 2017 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
name: Rum & IT
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
45 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
